content.question: The temporal character of Christo and Jeanne-Claudeâ€™s outdoor, site-specific installations, such as The Gates, was intended primarily to elicit which of the following responses from viewers?

choices.label: Appreciation for the ephemeral quality of their artworks
Religious reflection on the long process of artistic creation
Desire to extend the experience through the purchase of souvenirs
Inspire action against the rapid pace of environmental change

content.answer: Appreciation for the ephemeral quality of their artworks

topic.text: 10.2: Purpose and Audience in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
